text: Ruby Rose shared a message with fans on Thursday, taking to Twitter to reveal she ’ s dealing with a health issue that could result in her being seen in public using a cane or wheelchair. In order to get ahead of questions before they ’ re inevitably asked, the DJ, former “ Orange Is the New Black ” star and “ John Wick : Chapter 2 ” actress shared a photo of herself in a wheelchair and revealed she ’ s currently on the mend after undergoing a “ back procedure ” to address an unspecified spine problem she ’ s been dealing with for a decade.
